item.title: Sandworm
item.description: INTRODUCTION At the time of writing this walkthrough, this is still an Active box. It was released as the very first box for HTB’s Hackers Clash: Open Beta Season II. The box is hosting a webserver for a “Secret Spy Agency”. They seem to concern themselves with gathering intelligence from other agencies, but the website is mostly a tip-line: users can privately submit tips to SSA using their contact form and PGP key.
